name: tm13
effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Ice Beam to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Snore)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Fires an icy cold beam that may freeze the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: Fires an icy cold beam that may freeze the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is struck with an icy beam. It may freeze the foe solid.
